game.title: Bokkusu
game.description: Bokkusu is a real-time, single or two player puzzle game wherein the goal is to maneuver your block to the spinning portal sphere in as few moves a possible (solo) or before your opponent (two player). Once a block is set in motion, it continues in a straight line until it hits a wall or some other object. Either player can drop a crate by pressing button (1) or (4). Crates can be smashed through with a high speed collision.
